title: Flip to shh, Double-tap & Lift to check phone, Squeeze is not working
content:
After a factory reset, the following functions are still not working:
- Flip to shh (the setting actually disappeared from the Settings/Wellbeing app ?!)
- Double-tap to check phone
- Lift to check phone
- Squeeze for Assistant 

My screen is also staying on while on a call. I am already in contact with the support but it is a bit slow. Maybe anyone here has a quick fix? ðŸ˜…
